name: Dropgate Server
short_description: Privacy-first file sharing solution with end-to-end encryption, supporting hosted uploads and P2P...
description: Privacy-first file sharing solution with end-to-end encryption, supporting hosted uploads and P2P... Dropgate Server is a self-hosted application focused on tools, privacy, storage, files. It can be deployed on any device via Docker Compose.
usecases: Self-host Dropgate Server on your home server to privacy-first file sharing solution with end-to-end encryption, supporting hosted uploads and p2p.. without depending on third-party cloud services.
Use Dropgate Server to manage your tools workflows privately, keeping all data under your control on local infrastructure.
